version_description:
* Added trackpad mouse mode, enabled by default. The original mouse mode can be enabled on a per-game basis in the touch controller options.
* Fixed touch controller settings failing to save if they were modified before the touch controller had been us

* Added a trackpad aim mouse mode for FPS games
* Improved speed of trackpad mode cursor for some mobile and desktop resolutions
* Improved feel of trackpad mode cursor with gradual deceleration after lifting finger
* Fixed accidentally pressing

* Added the ability to rebind controls for MFi controllers
* Fixed crash when rebinding gamepad controls in the app settings
* Trackpad Aim mouse mode was renamed "Trackpad" and is now the default mouse mode
* Greatly improved sensitivity and usa

* Added option to disable performance icons in advanced streaming settings
* Fixed clicking on-screen controls while using the touch mouse
* Added chord shortcuts for controllers that are missing the full complement of buttons

* Reduced occasional dropped frames
* Various improvements to touch control layout, including dragging controls through other controls to get alignment guide lines

* Checking for computer status is now more responsive
* Added a loading screen while the connection is being established
* Show the red network icon when we stop receiving video from the host
* Added the ability to change touch control color a
Miscellaneous improvements and bug fixes

* Reduced audio dropouts
* Fixed occasional hang when starting a streaming connection
* Use PlayStation controller button images when a PS4 controller is connected

* Added global settings for toggling gyroscope, rumble, and fading controls
* Added per-config settings for pinch zoom/pan (defaulting off) and trackpad cursor speed
* Added a magnifying glass, available in the touch controller layout
* Added a f
* Re-enabled mouse clicks when mouse buttons are bound to on-screen buttons

* Added quick links to commonly played games on the main screen
* Fixed computers showing as offline when coming back from another application
* Fixed race condition where restarting the stream quickly could cause a spurious authorization dialog

* Fixed occasional crash in the app after streaming
* Added icons to show when audio, video or input are disabled in the settings
* Fixed icon scaling with touch controls bound to keyboard keys
* Fixed crash at startup

* Added a controller overlay with mouse mode, on-screen keyboard functionality and more!
* The Start/Back/Guide buttons have their normal functionality now, the overlay is brought up with a long button press
* Added an option for streaming microph

Fixed toggling the performance graph at runtime
Switched the default controller overlay button to the Back button

* Added support for new mouse and keyboard functionality on iOS 13.4 (direct mouse control only, FPS style input not available yet)
* Fixed crash on the Pair Controllers panel
* Allow music to continue playing in the background while streaming
*

* Fixed crash when pressing the menu button on MFi controllers
* Added button for cycling backward when editing action sets/layers
* Fixed long lines of text going offscreen when using button function inspector tool
* Fixed action layers showing

* Fixed crash when zoom accessibility feature is enabled
* Added tooltip descriptions for buttons in the controller overlay
* Improved detecting changed Steam clients when the host computer's MAC addresses are updated

* Added support for streaming to external displays
* Added support for low latency keyboard and mouse in iOS 14
* Added support for rumble on Xbox and PS4 controllers in iOS 14
* Added support for the guide button on Xbox and PS4 controllers in i
Added support for the PS4 controller LED and touchpad
Fixed touch controller gyro input
